name: spm-meeting-platform
description: Meeting platform with integrated backend API, signaling server, and React client

scripts.install:all: npm install --prefix backend && npm install --prefix signaling-server && npm install --prefix client
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix backend" "npm run dev --prefix signaling-server" "npm run start --prefix client"
scripts.start: concurrently "npm start --prefix backend" "npm start --prefix signaling-server" "npm run build --prefix client"
scripts.prisma:migrate: npm run prisma migrate dev --prefix backend
